title: Organic Herbal Elixir Vitality - Symbeeosis
description: Organic Herbal Elixir Vitality is a 100% natural food supplement, with Acerola & Blackcurrant that enhances physical and mental well-being thanks to active adaptogenic plant extracts.
text:
Main ingredients
Acerola (Vitamin C as L-Ascorbic acid 17%): One of the richest natural sources of vitamin C. Vitamin C is essential because it contributes to the normal functioning of the immune system.
Siberian Ginseng Extract 8: 1 (eleutherosides B + E min. 0.8%): supports the immune system, contributes to more physical and mental energy, improves physical and mental resistance in case of weakness, and supports the body’s natural defenses.
Blackcurrant 4:1 : builds up resistance against stress and unfavorable environmental conditions and helps the body cope with stress and tension.
Elderberry Fruit 4:1 : Contributes to the body’s natural defense.
Goji Berry: Rich in antioxidants and traditionally known to support the proper functioning of the immune system.
Innovation
Organic Herbal Elixirs are 100% natural, without preservatives, synthetics, sugar, or sweeteners while remaining delicious. At the same time, they are very easy to use and with a single dose, you get the required amount of ingredients you need. They consist of innovative active extracts of herbs & propolis as well as adaptogenic & nootropic herbs without additional vitamins & trace elements. The plant extracts come from titrated medicinal plants with traditional medicinal health benefits and propolis.
Adaptogens are herbal substances that help our body manage stress and maintain balance or homeostasis: They help us adapt to external stressors. By boosting our internal systems, adaptogens can boost vitality, stabilize mood, and improve performance and concentration. They help the body develop stress resistance and mitigate its further effects.
Useful info
Do not exceed the daily dose. Dietary supplements should not be used as a substitute for a balanced diet.
This product is not intended to prevent, treat, or cure any human disease. Consult your doctor if you are pregnant, breast-feeding, taking medication or have any health problems.
Keep out of reach of children under 3 years.
Store in a dry and cool place away from heat and sun exposure.
The product is not subject to a marketing authorization by EOF
EOF Notification No: 990/05-01-2022
Preparation Instructions
(adults and children> 12 years old):
Add a sachet of 3g daily in 200 ml of water, tea, juice or yogurt and smoothies. You can also create a completely naturally enhanced and healthy meal by adding it to yogurt, creating your delicious super bowl.
Be symbiotic
Combine your Organic Herbal Elixir Vitality with Organic Lemon Balm or Organic Lemon Verbena for better mood, relaxation, and spiritual well-being.
Tip: In addition to the Vitality Herbal elixir you can add, for extra flavor to your yogurt, a spoonful of organic functional honey & turmeric with anti-inflammatory properties that give extra energy.
Organic Herbal Elixir Vitality
19,50 €45g
